message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand its significance to you as well, and I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $1200000. This price reflects not only the cost of acquiring and maintaining the item but also the potential value it could bring to you. I am confident that you will find its worth far exceeds this investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to your consideration.
